en_US.project_summary: A one-stop SaaS product designed specifically for NFT creators, allowing them to design and distribute a wide range of NFTs with ease. Creators can simply register with their email address to access the platform and begin designing and issuing their unique NFTs.

zh_CN.project_summary: 专为 NFT 创作者打造的 NFT 创作和发行一站式 SaaS 产品，创作者只需要通过邮箱注册即可设计和发行灵活多样的 NFT。
